juste.title: Solo exhibition - May 2025
juste.desc: A warm event where we meet to celebrate joy, freedom and lustfullness. Welcome as you are, mingle and have fun!

about.title: About the artist
about.intro1: The strength of vulnerability. Her inner driving force emerges from feelings and impressions with emphasis on freedom and hope, pain and injustice. Kajsa has an attraction to the primordial power of humanity, nature and the great feminine strength, the one that is not always visible but is there. The crucial aspects our society so often rushes past and thus misses out on.
about.quote: 'The works are often initially created freely and intuitively, a bit like a dance'
about.intro2: After that, thoughts and a more structured work takes place to produce a composition. Finally, an often lengthy process begins with completing the work and giving it its expression and feeling. It may take time, a silent protest against the machinery of society and its all too fast pace.

contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: Reach out to me for any questions, orders, requests or potential collaborations. The simplest way is to send me an email
contact.intro2: or you can use the form on this page.
contact.orderDesc1: To place an order, fill the form, or send an email to
contact.orderDesc2: Write in the message how you prefer to get the painting delivered, some artworks can be shipped while some are wuite heavy. I sometimes offer to meet up in the Stockholms are or pick up at my art studio, whatever suits the needs best.
contact.orderDesc3: The studio is located about 35 minutes south of Stockholm city center.

form.name: Name
